root.name: Albert Odyssey: Legend of Eldean
root.description: OverviewAlbert Odyssey: Legend of Eldean, known in Japan as Albert Odyssey Gaiden ~Legend of Eldean~, is a Japanese role-playing game, developed by Sunsoft, that released exclusively for the Sega Saturn in August 1996. The game was then translated and published by Working Designs who released the game to North American audiences in July 1997. The game was a part of the 'Working Designs Ultra Series.' Development

similar_games.game: Final Fantasy IV: The Complete Collection
